page.title: 08Education
page.content: The younger children in the block attend Woolaston County Primary School which is a mixed school of 182 pupils.The senior pupils go by bus 8 miles to Wyedean School in Sedbury-a mixed comprehensive with 660 pupils,aged from 11 to 18. Computers have recently been installed in both schools. Survey on computers in Woolaston School. No.of children in school Boys 101 Girls 81 Total 182 No.of children having computer at home Boys 36 =36% Girls 26 =32% Total 62 Types of computers owned BBC, Electron, Acorn = 22 Sinclair Spectrum = 25 Commodore = 11 Other makes = 6 Total = 62
